generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible lane markings, designed for vehicle traffic, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian area is visible on the left side of the road, adjacent to the parked cars and bicycles, with a curb separating it from the road.
- building: A multi-story commercial building with large windows and signage (e.g., "INFINITY CLUB", "denns") is prominently featured on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible along the right side of the road and in the background, providing shade.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing bright and clear.
- person: A person is standing on the sidewalk near the bicycles on the left side of the image, facing away from the camera.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, including a silver Smart car in the foreground and a white car further back.
- truck: A yellow Mercedes-Benz van is visible driving down the road, which is classified as a truck.
- fence: A temporary fence made of wooden planks and metal frames is visible on the right side of the road, near construction materials.
- pole: Several red-and-white striped poles are visible along the right side of the road, likely used for construction or traffic control.
- traffic sign: A small, circular traffic sign is visible on a pole near the construction area on the right side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked among the bicycles on the left side of the road, near the front of the image.
